TITLE: Martin's Card Extractor
CREATOR: Martin Gonzalvez
DESCRIPTION: A free web app to extract individual card images from PnP PDF files by drawing grids along the cutting guides.

TITLE: Martin's Card Formatter
CREATOR: Martin Gonzalvez
DESCRIPTION: A free web app to upload individual card images and lay them out as properly formatted PnP PDF files.

TITLE: PnP Launchpad
CREATOR: Martin Gonzalvez
DESCRIPTION: A website to keep track of current and upcoming PnP crowdfunding projects and promotions.

TITLE: PnPFinder
CREATOR: Martin Gonzalvez
DESCRIPTION: A community-curated website to search for and discover worthwhile PnP games.

TITLE: Games That Are Free To Print and Play
CREATOR: Chad V
DESCRIPTION: A geeklist of free PnP games.

TITLE: Kickstarters with PnP versions available (& other crowdfunding)
DESCRIPTION: An updated geeklist to keep track of crowdfunding projects with print and play options.

TITLE: Excavating all the Dungeon Crawling PNP
CREATOR: Marianne Waage
DESCRIPTION: There are so many free dungeon crawling PNP games, I'm not sure where to start. I thought maybe having a list might help me organize them.

TITLE: Currently running contests
CREATOR: Robert C
DESCRIPTION: Link to the bgg currently running contests. Scroll up and go back through the pages for certified PnP gold.

TITLE: PnP Cousins of Commercial Games
DESCRIPTION: This is not a list of commercial games that have free PnP demo versions. And it's not a list of fan-made expansions. It is more like "if you like (insert commercial game) then you will probably like (insert free PnP game)".

TITLE: Project SHRINKO! Tiny versions of big BIG games
CREATOR: John Kean
DESCRIPTION: Transforming big games into tiny 9-card (or thereabouts) games.

TITLE: Sites To Download Games (PnP)
CREATOR: Alex B. (@admiral142 on BGG)
DESCRIPTION: This is a list of websites where you can find PnP games. There are free, as well as purchasable games on these sites.

TITLE: Solitaire Print and Play Contest Winners
CREATOR: Mark Morrise
DESCRIPTION: Top three winners of the Solitaire Print and Play Contest from 2011-2019.

TITLE: Top 3 Solo Winners of the 9-card PnP Design Contest
DESCRIPTION: Top 3 winners of the solo category in BGG's 9 card nanogame competition. 2014-present

TITLE: The Monthly Print and Play Crafting List
DESCRIPTION: The "What Print & Play Games Are You Crafting or Planning on Crafting This Month?" list has been running on BGG each month continuously for nearly 15 years. It's a grand institution in the world of PnP. This link is to the subscription thread which links to the current month's list.

TITLE: PnP Games on Your Table
DESCRIPTION: This monthly list is focused on the PnP games that the community is playing for the current month.

TITLE: The Print and Play Hideaway
CREATOR: Martin Gonzalvez
DESCRIPTION: A Facebook group for, by, and about the PnP community.

TITLE: r/PrintandPlay Subreddit
DESCRIPTION: A forum dedicated to the hobby of crafting and playing print and play (PnP) games.

TITLE: Wydrukuj i Graj- Gry Print&Play
CREATOR: Radosław Ignatów
DESCRIPTION: Polish Facebook group focused on Print & Play games

TITLE: Paradox Games
CREATOR: @CyBadger
DESCRIPTION: Bringing Solo Gaming To A New Dimension

TITLE: Print And Play Brasil
CREATOR: Joquinhos Hard
DESCRIPTION: Group created to discuss and share game files created in Print and Play format or game files that have been made available by authors or publishers to be printed. Reinforcing that even PNP games must have been made available free of charge and that we only deal with games in PORTUGUESE.

TITLE: Free PnP Wargames
DESCRIPTION: Free PnP wargames at grognard.com.

TITLE: itch.io Physical Games (tagged "Print and Play")
DESCRIPTION: Print and play games available on itch.io.

TITLE: HAMMERDICE
CREATOR: Radosław Ignatów
DESCRIPTION: Print & Play games by Radosław Ignatów

TITLE: Heavy Punch Games
CREATOR: Marek Vogelsinger
DESCRIPTION: Creative tabletop game studio that specializes in strategy and survival games with Print and Play versions.

TITLE: White Dog Games
CREATOR: Michael W. Kennedy
DESCRIPTION: A website with numerous solitaire war games, and according to the website owner: 'We are a small group of designers, artists, developers, and play testers who have fun making games on topics that interest us. ​Our games are published in boxed and print-and-play (PNP) formats. Print and-play games are downloaded, printed off at home, and assembled by the player.'

TITLE: DicePen
CREATOR: DicePen
DESCRIPTION: Roll and Write games at your disposal.

TITLE: Drivethrurpg
DESCRIPTION: An extensive list of RPG's available in PDF and Print on Demand formats.

TITLE: Component Studio
DESCRIPTION: An online, subscription-based formatting tool to easily format 100's of cards and output PnP PDF files, or upload to The Gamecrafter.

TITLE: Super Deluxe Tuckbox Template Maker
CREATOR: Craig P Forbes
DESCRIPTION: Custom tuckbox template generation

TITLE: PnP Buddy
CREATOR: Alexander Norback
DESCRIPTION: A free online tool to format your print and play files and adjust front-back page alignment.

TITLE: CardFoldr
CREATOR: Gina Foosel
DESCRIPTION: A tool to help you convert a PDF of card grids into a gutterfold PDF.

TITLE: PnP Tool
DESCRIPTION: A Windows-based tool to perform various formatting tasks for PnP files.

TITLE: TCG Proxy Generator
DESCRIPTION: This tool lets you drag in images of cards or folders of images and export multi-page, ready-to-print PDFs that can be cut up and slipped into card sleeves.

TITLE: Works-in-Progress subforum on Boardgamegeek.com
DESCRIPTION: Discover PnP games that are still being developed, or play earlier PnP versions of games that eventually got published. There are many PnP treasures to discover, hidden within.

TITLE: Template Maker
DESCRIPTION: Create and download custom sized papercraft and packaging templates (e.g., game boxes!) for free!

TITLE: EasyPackMaker
DESCRIPTION: EasyPackMaker™ is a designer that automatically calculates a packaging model (e.g. game boxes!) based on your data.

TITLE: PNG to PDF Converter
DESCRIPTION: Online utility for converting 1 or more PNGs to one or more PDF files. You can upload multiple PNGs and download as a single PDF or multiple PDFs. Any uploaded files are deleted from the server after 1 hour. Additional options are available for converting between PDF and JPG, merging multiple PDFs into 1 PDF, etc.

TITLE: BookletFree
DESCRIPTION: Free online PDF to booklet converter with options to produce A5-A8 layouts.

TITLE: Bookbinder JS
CREATOR: momijizukamori
DESCRIPTION: A Javascript-based app for formatting PDFs for bookbinding-- a process called imposition.

TITLE: nanDECK
CREATOR: Nand
DESCRIPTION: A free tool for designing games, enabling users to create custom cards and components via scripting and spreadsheet integration.
